snippet: Respirator masks, used by responders after the 9/11 attacks, played a role in exposing thousands to contaminated air, but the government and the hazardous-equipment industry are trying for better.
abstract: Poorly functioning respirator masks used by workers at ground zero after September 11 attacks played role in exposing thousands to contaminated air; government and hazardous-equipment industry are together working to create new generation of respirator masks to be used by rescue and cleanup workers and also to protect against potential disease outbreaks or releases of nanoparticles.
lead_paragraph: Respirator masks, used by responders after the 9/11 attacks, played a role in exposing thousands to contaminated air, but the government and the hazardous-equipment industry are trying for better.

headline.main: Improving Respirator Masks to Put Fresh Air in Reach
